title: Move HomePage AdSense to single above-content placement

requirements.summary: Position the HomePage AdSense block directly below the sticky header and above the main content/controls area.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, an AdSense ad unit is rendered directly below the sticky header and before the main content/controls section.
The ad placement change does not break existing interactions (rates table search/sort, open/close historical panel, comparison panel).
If AdSense is not configured or the ad slot is missing/empty, the existing fallback UI (“Ad space” / “Advertisement”) still renders and reserves space to keep layout stable.

file_operations.description: Adjust the HomePage layout so the single AdSenseAd render is placed in the above-content position (directly after the sticky header and before the main content/controls), keeping existing spacing and ensuring the fallback placeholder continues to reserve height for layout stability. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Ensure HomePage renders exactly one AdSenseAd placement (above-content only) and removes any other Home page ad placements.
acceptanceCriteria: The Home page contains exactly one <AdSenseAd /> placement.
The ad is not rendered in the middle of the page content or near/above the footer once this change is implemented.
No console errors are introduced by changing the number/position of ad units.

file_operations.description: Remove the middle-page and footer AdSenseAd sections so the HomePage contains only one above-content AdSenseAd; update imports accordingly to avoid unused slot helpers and ensure no console warnings/errors are introduced by the reduced number of ad units. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
